name: Apple Man
description:
Apple Man has been separated from his family, but longstanding rivalries between the produce clans endanger his return. Can you safely navigate your way back home or will you upset the apple cart?

Note: Apple Man is intended to be played at the default resolution of the game window; if you see blue trim, the window is too wide, and if Apple Man can walk offscreen, the window is too tall.

Controls

WASD - Move, Jump, and Crouch

J - Punch

K - Dash on ground or wall

Tip: Crouch or slide to fit through small gaps - move against walls when falling to start a wall-slide!

Developed over two weeks as part of the inaugural Game Jam for Love, with the theme "Pixel Arcade."

Pixel Orchards

Programming: Drew Van Anne  and Tim Janssen

Level Design: Robert Kiefer

Art: Guy Grossfeld and Jake LaCombe

Music: Anthony Gentile

Narrative: Mercedes Hesselroth

Original asset pack by Phil Giarrusso

Music pack by Andrey Sitkov

Apple Man Sounds/Theme Song by Nathan Cleary

Special thanks to Games for Love and Matt Colón

No produce was harmed in the making of this game
